ai.summary: Milennium Mile is a short, easy 5.3 km hike in the UK, suitable for most walkers and families seeking a relaxed outdoor stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained footpaths with level to gently rolling terrain. Some sections may be gravel or surfaced; expect occasional gentle inclines.
ai.safety_notes: Always check the weather and daylight hours before setting off. Wear sturdy footwear with good grip and stay on marked paths. Take a map or GPS device and keep your phone charged. Carry water and a snack, plus a small first aid kit. Dress in layers and bring a waterproof layer in case of rain. If hiking with children or pets, supervise them closely. Let someone know your plans and estimated return time, especially if you are alone.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or lightweight hiking boots
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, though spring, summer, and autumn are ideal for comfortable temperatures; in winter be prepared for rain, mud, and colder conditions.
